languages.text: "Что за вздор, звезды не исчезают просто так! Но если мои глаза не лгут... Лорд-капитан, Гордость Сантиэля — важный стратегический объект династии Чорда, что в одиночку обеспечивает прометием весь их протекторат. Понять, что случилось, не так уж сложно — проклятые ксеносы постарались! Но это не значит, что стоит вот так просто оставлять им на съедение важные стратегические ресурсы. Предлагаю сделать одолжение династии Чорда и спасти остатки ее прометия".

traits.locale_text: "Что за вздор, звезды не исчезают просто так! Но если мои глаза не лгут... Лорд-капитан, Гордость Сантиэля — важный стратегический объект династии Чорда, что в одиночку обеспечивает прометием весь их протекторат. Понять, что случилось, не так уж сложно — проклятые ксеносы постарались! Но это не значит, что стоит вот так просто оставлять им на съедение важные стратегические ресурсы. Предлагаю сделать одолжение Инсцендии Чорда и спасти остатки ее прометия".

languages.text: "What nonsense, stars do not vanish from the sky without a trace! But unless my eyes are deceiving me... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do House Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of their promethium."

It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them! But this does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."

It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."

languages.text: « Ça n'a aucun sens, les étoiles ne disparaissent pas sans laisser de trace ! Mais à moins que ma vue ne me joue des tours... {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la Gloire de Santiel est une planète d'une grande importance stratégique pour la dynastie Chorda. Elle permettrait à elle seule de subvenir aux besoins en prométhium du protectorat tout entier. On devine aisément ce qui s'est passé ici : ces maudits xénos ont repéré une proie facile et, par le Trône, ils ont réussi leur coup ! Toutefois, ça ne signifie pas qu'il faille les laisser piller des ressources essentielles sans sourciller. Je suggère de rendre service à Incendia Chorda en récupérant le prométhium qui lui appartient de droit... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
languages.original_text: "What nonsense, stars do not vanish from the sky without a trace! But unless my eyes are deceiving me... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."

Je suggère de rendre service à Incendia Chorda en récupérant le prométhium qui lui appartient de droit... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »

languages.text: “这简直是疯了，恒星根本不会从天上凭空消失！除非我的眼睛出了问题……舰长大人，桑提尔之傲对库尔达王朝具有重要的战略意义，它可以供应整个王朝的钷素需求。当下发生的事情很容易理解，那些该死的异形谋划了极其复杂的阴谋，可黄金王座在上，他们竟然得手了！但即便如此，我们也不能把这些重要的战略资源任由他们掠夺。我建议我们帮因森蒂娅·库尔达一个忙，替她回收剩下的钷素。”
languages.original_text: "What nonsense, stars do not vanish from the sky without a trace! But unless my eyes are deceiving me... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."

traits.locale_text: “这简直是疯了，恒星根本不会从天上凭空消失！除非我的眼睛出了问题……舰长大人，桑提尔之傲对库尔达王朝具有重要的战略意义，它可以供应整个王朝的钷素需求。当下发生的事情很容易理解，那些该死的异形谋划了极其复杂的阴谋，可黄金王座在上，他们竟然得手了！但即便如此，我们也不能把这些重要的战略资源任由他们掠夺。我建议我们帮因森蒂娅·库尔达一个忙，替她回收剩下的钷素。”

languages.text: "Welch ein Unsinn, Sterne verschwinden doch nicht einfach spurlos vom Himmel! Doch wenn mein Blick mich nicht trügt ... Lord Captain, Santiels Stolz ist für die Chorda-Dynastie von strategischer Bedeutung. Diese Welt allein deckt den Promethium-Bedarf des gesamten Protektorats ab. Man muss kein Genie sein, um zu erraten, was geschehen ist. Das war kein leichtes Unterfangen für die verfluchten Xenos, aber beim Thron, sie haben es bewerkstelligt! Das heißt aber nicht, dass wir ihnen die wichtigen strategischen Güter einfach überlassen können. Ich schlage vor, dass wir Incendia Chorda einen Gefallen tun und die Reste ihes Promethiums retten."
languages.original_text: "What nonsense, stars do not vanish from the sky without a trace! But unless my eyes are deceiving me... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."

Man muss kein Genie sein, um zu erraten, was geschehen ist. Das war kein leichtes Unterfangen für die verfluchten Xenos, aber beim Thron, sie haben es bewerkstelligt! Das heißt aber nicht, dass wir ihnen die wichtigen strategischen Güter einfach überlassen können. Ich schlage vor, dass wir Incendia Chorda einen Gefallen tun und die Reste ihes Promethiums retten."

languages.text: «¿Estrellas desapareciendo del cielo sin dejar rastro? ¡Qué disparate! Pero si la vista no me falla... Lord Capitán, Orgullo de Santiel es un punto estratégico clave para la dinastía Chorda. Por sí solo, cubre las necesidades de prometio de todo el protectorado. No es difícil deducir lo sucedido: esos miserables xenos lo tenían todo en contra, pero ¡por el Trono que lo consiguieron! Esto no quiere decir que podamos abandonar esas importantes reservas para que las saquee cualquiera. Deberíamos hacerle un favor a Incendia Chorda y recuperar lo que queda de prometio».
languages.original_text: "What nonsense, stars do not vanish from the sky without a trace! But unless my eyes are deceiving me... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."

No es difícil deducir lo sucedido: esos miserables xenos lo tenían todo en contra, pero ¡por el Trono que lo consiguieron! Esto no quiere decir que podamos abandonar esas importantes reservas para que las saquee cualquiera. Deberíamos hacerle un favor a Incendia Chorda y recuperar lo que queda de prometio».

languages.text: 「バカな話です。星が忽然と空から消えるなどありえません！見間違いでもない限り、こんな…ロード・キャプテン、サンティエル・プライドはチョーダ王朝にとって戦略的に重要な惑星です。あの惑星だけで、彼らの全保護領のプロメチウムの需要を賄っています。何が起こったのか確認するのはそう難しくはありません。惑星の襲撃は骨の折れる事だったでしょうに、王座よ、忌まわしい異種族はやり遂げてしまったのです！だからと言って、重要な戦略的資産を好きなままに略奪させておくのはいただけませんね。提案ですが、インセンディア・チョーダの協力を得て、残ったプロメチウムを救出しませんか」
languages.original_text: "What nonsense, stars do not vanish from the sky without a trace! But unless my eyes are deceiving me... Lord Captain, Santiel's Pride is an object of strategic importance to the Chorda dynasty. It alone covers the promethium needs of their entire protectorate. It is not difficult to figure out what happened, the damned xenos had their work cut out for them, but, by the Throne, they succeeded! This does not mean we can leave the important strategic assets for them to plunder. I suggest we do Incendia Chorda a favour and salvage the remains of her promethium."
